briefTitle: A Open-label Study Investigating the Safety and Tolerability of NPSP558, a Recombinant Human Parathyroid Hormone (rhPTH [1-84]), for the Treatment of Adults With Hypoparathyroidism - A Clinical Extension Study (RACE)
officialTitle: A Long-term Open-label Study Investigating the Safety and Tolerability of NPSP558, a Recombinant Human Parathyroid Hormone (rhPTH[1-84]), for the Treatment of Adults With Hypoparathyroidism - A Clinical Extension Study (RACE)
summary: This study is a long-term, open-label study using NPSP558 for the treatment of adult patients with Hypoparathyroidism.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Event (TEAE) and Treatment Emergent Serious Adverse Event (TESAE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From start of study drug administration up to follow-up (82 months)
